snippet: A 12-year-old boy at a Boy Scout camp in San Diego died from a gunshot wound to the head on Monday, and the police were investigating whether the shooting had been self-inflicted or accidental.
abstract: Boy at San Diego Boy Scout camp dies from gunshot wound to the head, and police are investigating whether the shooting was self-inflicted or accidental; officials are unclear as to how gun had gotten into camp, which offered no firearms activities.
lead_paragraph: A 12-year-old boy at a Boy Scout camp in San Diego died from a gunshot wound to the head on Monday, and the police were investigating whether the shooting had been self-inflicted or accidental.

headline.main: California: Boy Scout Killed by Gun at Camp
headline.print_headline: California: Boy Scout Killed by Gun at Camp
